summary: Staff Accountant with extensive payroll and accounting experience across multiple organizations, proficient in payroll processing, timekeeping systems (Kronos, Nextgen, ADP/eTime), general ledger, accounts payable, benefits, tax compliance, and payroll auditing; skilled at process improvement and implementing automated payroll solutions.

experience.title: Staff Accountant
experience.description: Review, verify and input personnel action forms; process Kronos-based time sheets for school employees; manage annual payroll over $18 million; process time sheets for bus/shuttle drivers; enter direct deposit, W-4, and A-4 forms using Nextgen; ensure accurate monthly payroll processing and corrections; analyze reports to identify variances; ensure prorated salary changes per policy; support standardized payroll processes per school board policies.

experience.title: Payroll Administrator
experience.description: Responsible for all payroll functions; updated payroll records and deductions; provided timesheet training and access credentials for new hires; maintained payroll policies; ensured compliance with federal, state, and local regulations; prepared post-payroll tax GL entries; supported annual payroll audit; prepared documents for Sox audits; maintained confidentiality.

experience.title: Payroll Specialist
experience.description: Developed and processed confidential payroll documentation for ~300 employees; managed payroll budget over $45 million; served as POC for ADP and eTime for Blood Services Division; improved timesheet input accuracy and payroll output; trained timekeepers; authored a user-friendly payroll manual; issued W-2s for the region; supported year-end close.

experience.title: Staff Accountant
experience.description: Processed bi-weekly and semi-monthly payroll for 180 employees nationwide; analyzed benefit elections; executed garnishments and child support orders; reconciled payroll bank accounts; processed AP checks; prepared journal entries and GL adjustments for month-end close.

experience.title: Payroll Specialist
experience.description: Managed payroll for nearly 400 employees in Retail; verified applicant packets; input data in ADP system; registered new associates for accurate compensation; handled job verifications from businesses and creditors.

experience.title: Payroll Accountant
experience.description: Reviewed confidential contract offer letters for tenured and part-time professors; negotiated contracts; tracked labor funding and ensured budget compliance; coordinated insurance and retirement benefits for faculty and staff; allocated funds for contracts and matched final disbursements.
